metadata.metaValue: Create a strands shaped like stairs, resample it to add more subdivisions.
Create a scalar noise field and animate it using the time.

Smooths the strands with 50 iterations.
The smoothing amount is controled using the field.
When the sampled field value is 0, no smoothing is applied.
When the sampled field value is 1, the full smoothing is applied
Convert the strands to points, draw the scalar field and set color and render settings. Draw in the viewport.
Smooth a strand using a scalar noise field.
